extendedInfo.description: Unique Hidden Object Game play with 40 stunning forests to explore and unlimited game time! Sam,Joe and Sarah, somehow finds an island after their boat sank into the sea. The island is covered with thick forest and the trio entered the jungle to look for some help,but their bad luck brings them to a secret tribal village.

reviews.comment: I like the game ...hard to see object which gives a good challenge...seems to run a bit slow...going to install until a save op is added
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: You have to keep starting at the beginning because you can not save the game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs a save option!!! Its an ok game but really sucks to have to start all over once you exit
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The graphics are beautiful, but all the same really and the objects are pretty much the same and too small! Could be better but awesome graphics!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lots of levels which is good but over all meh.... I like hidden object games but this one is a little dull.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sorry, I will give you ann A for effort but rally the o bjectsare mucht oosmall even in magnified mode. It\'s also a bit boring. Upgrade out pls.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Like the app but it needs a save feature!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bought it but it won\'t play
reviews.comment: Really angry...I actually spent money for this game and it force closes before ever loading. I have uninstalled and reinstalled to no avail. Sucks
reviews.author: Chassiddy Brown
